text: Koipuram is a village in Pathanamthitta District, in the state of Kerala, India. ==Language== Malayalam is the native language of Koipuram. ==Demographics== Koipuram is a census village with 7319 families. The population of Koipuram area is 26425, of which 12231 are males while 14194 are females. ==Politics== Koipuram is a part of Pathanamthitta Loksabha constituency. Mr. Anto Antony is the current Member of Parliament of the constituency. ==Weather== The climate of the place is moderate and pleasant. Tropical climate is prevailed here throughout the year. ==Transportation== The major transportation service of this place is provided by Kerala State Road Transport Corporation (KSRTC). ==References== Category:Villages in Pathanamthitta district
title: Koipuram
